meta_title: Fight a Speeding Ticket in Edmonton | Fabsy
meta_description: Local guide to fighting speeding tickets in Edmonton. Free eligibility check, disclosure requests, and trusted representation.
h1: Fight a Speeding Ticket in Edmonton
hook: You may be able to dispute a speeding ticket in Edmonton — request disclosure and get a free eligibility check.
what: Disputing a ticket starts with disclosure — review the evidence and consider next steps with Fabsy's free review.
how: Request disclosure, assemble evidence, and we'll advise on whether a dispute is likely to succeed.
next: Upload your ticket and receive a free eligibility read within 24 hours.

faqs.a: It costs $488 for our core package with a zero-risk guarantee; you only pay if we save you money.
Usually not — we appear on your behalf for most violations. We will notify you if attendance is required.
faqs.q: Do I need to appear in court?

faqs.a: The process typically takes 3-6 months from submission to resolution.
